posts.post_content:
LOWER PRICES ON TWO REMAINING PSA CARDS:

I want to sell the two remaining PSA cards...both actually very nice cards.  

Wagner is valued at $80 on a website that always undervalues the cards...
Heinie Wagner - Bat on right shoulder - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - PSA 4 - was $90 - then asking $78 - new lower price $68

Jack White - Buffalo, Follow Through - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - PSA 4 - was $70 - then asking $52 - new lower price $48

If anyone is willing to get both of those cards, the total would usually be $116...but I would do it for $110 if getting both.  I really want to sell these cards.  I can only accept paypal payments...and I will cover shipping charges as well.  If interested, please e-mail as soon as possible at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url].  Thank you for your interest!!! 

Hi!  I unfortunately have to sell my collection of T206 cards.  I have already posted information about my sale.  I was selling 70 cards and 16 have sold.  To try to sell as many as possible in the shortest amount of time, I am discounting the prices on my PSA cards.  I am still willing to consider ALL offers even lower than what I am asking...especially if you're getting more than one card.  I also have many graded SGC T206 cards available as well if you are interested.  E-mail me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url] if you want to see scans, make offers, or inquire about any of my SGC cards as well.  I just figured I'd start by discounting the PSA's since I don't have too many of those.  Here is the list of the PSA cards (shipping has been costing me around $5 per card, but as a courtesy, I will cover the shipping costs as well):

Christy Mathewson (HOF) - Dark Cap - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 42 (Overprint) - PSA 3 - was $415 - now asking $385  SOLD

Hal Chase - Throwing, Dark Cap - Sweet Caporal 350 Fact. 25 - PSA 4 - was $80 - now asking $70  SOLD

Heinie Wagner - Bat on right shoulder - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - PSA 4 - was $90 - now asking $78

Jack White - Buffalo, Follow Through - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - PSA 4 - was $70 - now asking $52

Joe Lake - With Ball - Polar Bear - PSA 3 - was $60 - now asking $49  SOLD

Lou Ritter - Fielding - Sweet Caporal 350 Fact. 30 - PSA 4 - was $70 - now asking $55  SOLD

Rube Marquard (HOF) - Follow Through - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 30 - PSA 4.5 - was $250 - now asking $220  SOLD


NEW SALE:
I really want to sell these cards, so I am going to continue by discounting my SGC 30's.  I know I may have to take a loss in order to sell these cards (it was my own fault by overpaying for some of them)  Again...I am still willing to consider ALL offers...especially if getting multiple cards. (paypal only please).  Please contact me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url].  Thanks!  SGC 30's for sale are:

Bill Bergen - Catching - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 42 OVERPRINT - SGC 30 - was $50 - now asking $42 SOLD

Bill Hart (SL) - Portrait - Old Mill Southern - SGC 30 - was $85 - now asking $78

Frank King (SL) - Portrait - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - SGC 30 - was $65 - now asking $58

Hal Chase - Pink Portrait - Sweet Caporal 150 Fact. 30 - SGC 30 - was $85 - now asking $66  SOLD

Jesse Tannehill - Ready to Throw - Old Mill Black - SGC 30 - was $45 - now asking $36

John Anderson - Fielding - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - SGC 30 - was $35 - now asking $26

I will cover the shipping costs as well!!!!!
Thank you for your interest!!!
-RachB4980

Forgot to mention...I can only accept paypal payments.

Thanks again for your interest!

Marquard and Mathewson sales pending payment...

Let me know if anyone is still interested in Ritter, Wagner, or White...all happen to be very nice cards...throw out your offers....willing to consider all...
When I look down this page I see too many threads of yours. Be careful and courteous of others please. thanks

posts.post_title: don't know how else to do it
posts.post_content: I don't know how else to respond to threads.  I am not doing it to be rude...just don't know how else to.  I actually want to put more cards on sale, but am afraid to start a new thread...maybe you could help...

You can edit your threads/posts by clicking [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=45623&d=1315597514[/IMG] and then [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=45622&d=1315597509[/IMG].  This will allow you to change not only the content of your post, but the title as well.  :)

email sent for
Lou Ritter - Fielding - Sweet Caporal 350 Fact. 30 - PSA 4 - was $70 - now asking $55
Bill Bergen - Catching - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 42 OVERPRINT - SGC 30 - was $50 - now asking $42
Hal Chase - Pink Portrait - Sweet Caporal 150 Fact. 30 - SGC 30 - was $85 - now asking $66

[quote name="Leon" post=923972]When I look down this page I see too many threads of yours. Be careful and courteous of others please. thanks[/QUOTE]

Leon, you are the most patient and polite moderator on the internet.
Mazel Tov!
Received the Mathewson and Marquard throwing today, nice cards thank you.

Thank you for letting me know you received them!  I'm glad they arrived safely.  I am probably going to be putting a lot more of my cards at MUCH lower prices this week, so e-mail me if you're interested in any in particular (not sure if you only collect PSA though...only 2 PSA left and all the rest SGC).  Thanks again for your interest!!! Greatly appreciated!!!
